English: A while later, Provins
Defeated. Disgraced. Again! What will they say home?
I wouldn't care about that right now. We should be thinking how the hell are we gonna get out of here alive!
Levie is still holding. We will make it in time, surely.
What if we don't?
Enough, comrades. We're close to the enemy lines. We'll need to be very quick. Have faith in our arms and now watch the road!
Oh my god, they're all dead. I have to get to the bay alone.
I'm too late. They're already gone...
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, GENERAL RETREAT IS IN EFFECT! ALL UNITS HEAD FOR SAINT PIERRE! THOSE IN THE NORTHERN PART OF THE ISLAND SHOULD HURRY, LEVIE IS UNDER HEAVY ATTACK! BAZA OUT.
SLOW DOWN! I THINK I SAW SOMETHING IN THOSE TREES!
I MUST HAVE IMAGINED IT... LET'S GO ON...
WE'RE UNDER ATTACK, QUICKLY GET OUT!
WE HAVE TO GET TO THAT FOREST! THE ROAD IS NO LONGER SAFE!
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, MORTON AND LEVIE WERE LOST. THE ENEMY IS NOW HEADING FURTHER SOUTH. GET QUICKLY TO SAINT PIERRE! BAZA OUT.

ANTON TO BAZA, WE ARE STILL NORTH OF LEVIE. OUR CONVOY WAS AMBUSHED AND WE ARE ON FOOT. WE HID IN THE FOREST BUT THE ENEMY IS ALL AROUND US. HOW ARE WE SUPPOSED TO GET THROUGH LEVIE? HELP US HERE, BAZA, OVER.
WE HEAR YOU ANTON. WE'RE SENDING A FEW SHIPS TO THE SMALL BAY AT FB65. THE AREA IS HOT SO THEY WON'T STICK AROUND FOR LONG. TRY TO GET THERE AS FAST AS POSSIBLE. GOOD LUCK, MEN. BAZA OUT.
WE'RE GOING SOUTH, MEN. THE SHIPS WILL BE WAITING NOT FAR FROM HERE. WE CAN STILL MAKE IT. FOLLOW ME!
WATCH OUT, TANKS FROM THE NORTH! GET DOWN QUICKLY!
FOLLOW ME, MEN. WE CAN STILL MAKE IT!
SHIT, THE TANKS ARE BACK! FIND COVER!
Evacuation from the Island
Forest
Bay
BAY
SAINT PIERRE
